name: skilled-intelligence
description: Curated collection of intelligent development tools combining spec-driven methodology, AI-powered code search, and architectural analysis for evidence-based software engineering

plugins.name: code-intelligence
plugins.description: Intelligent code search and architectural analysis powered by Exa API. Search billions of GitHub repos for real examples and analyze architectures using first-principles thinking.

plugins.name: skill-tools
plugins.description: Meta-plugin for creating custom Claude skills. Includes scaffolding, validation, and packaging scripts.

plugins.name: learning-tools
plugins.description: Interactive teaching skills with chunked explanations, comprehension checks, and interrupt handling. Use for explaining code, concepts, or learning on-the-go.

plugins.name: creative-tools
plugins.description: Creative output skills for diagrams, UI design, generative art, and visual explanations. Produces publication-quality Mermaid diagrams, distinctive frontends, and ASCII visualizations.

plugins.name: workflow-tools
plugins.description: Development workflow skills for session handoffs, implementation planning, task orchestration, and XML context structuring. Enables seamless multi-session work.

plugins.name: git-tools
plugins.description: Git workflow commands for commits, PR descriptions, and code quality enforcement. Follows Rich Hickey's Simple Made Easy principles.
